rows.label: qst201102_msg0001
rows.name: There's a note attached to it.

rows.label: qst201102_msg0002
rows.name: What's it say, Nia?

rows.label: qst201102_msg0003
rows.name: Gimme a sec...

rows.label: qst201102_msg0004
rows.name:
Look for Thunder Crystal in
the Old Quarry in Invidia...

rows.label: qst201102_msg0005
rows.name:
and then stand by at
Gula's Garagorm's Arch.

rows.label: qst201102_msg0006
rows.name:
Follow these instructions and you
are sure to regain your memories.

rows.label: qst201102_msg0008
rows.name: Whose memories...?

rows.label: qst201102_msg0009
rows.name: It's probably just some stupid prank.

rows.label: qst201102_msg0010
rows.name:
That, or it's a trap. Of course, I'd
much prefer if it were a prank.

rows.label: qst201102_msg0011
rows.name:
Yeah. In either case,
probably best to ignore it.

rows.label: qst201102_msg0013
rows.name: ...Wait.

rows.label: qst201102_msg0014
rows.name: What's up, Mikumari?

rows.label: qst201102_msg0015
rows.name:
If they'd intended to hurt us,
they'd already be attacking us
this very moment, right?

rows.label: qst201102_msg0016
rows.name:
And if that were the case, they
wouldn't have missed their mark
with the lance either...

rows.label: qst201102_msg0017
rows.name: ...Very true.

rows.label: qst201102_msg0018
rows.name:
So I'm just wondering...maybe there's
a meaning to all this. They're clearly
going to a lot of trouble.

rows.label: qst201102_msg0019
rows.name:
I can't help but wonder
what whoever's doing this
is trying to achieve...

rows.label: qst201102_msg0020
rows.name:
I think we should follow
the instructions. But I'll
respect your decision.

rows.label: qst201102_msg0021
rows.name:
There's still the possibility that
it's a trap, but there is merit
in the experience regardless.

rows.label: qst201102_msg0022
rows.name: I'm with you, Mikumari. We'll do it.

rows.label: qst201102_msg0023
rows.name: Everyone okay with that?

rows.label: qst201102_msg0024
rows.name:
Sure. Can't resist a
good puzzle. Let's go!

rows.label: qst201102_msg0025
rows.name: Thank you!
